titleStmt.title: By the Lords-Justices and Council. A proclamation. Charles Porter, Tho: Coningesby. Since it hath pleased almighty God of his great goodness to the Protestant subjects of this kingdom, to raise up his most excellent Majesty King William to deliver them ...
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lords Justices and Council.
Coningsby, Thomas Coningsby, Earl, 1656?-1729.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook, assignee of Benjamin Tooke, printer to the King and Queens most excellent Majesties on Ormonde-Key,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening words of text.
"Given at the Council-Chamber the 15th day of June, 1691.".
Steele notation: Arms 201. Goodness Majesties 2) Forces du-.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
